mapper.select: select sort, goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, sales_price salesPrice, goods_introduce goodsIntroduce, from t_host_goods as a inner join t_goods as b on a.goods_id = b.goods_id and is_delete = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_host_goods (goods_Id, sort, is_delete, creat_by, creat_time, version) value (#{goodsId}, #{sort}, 0, #{creatBy}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update t_host_goods set goods_id = #{goodsId}, sort = #{sort}, last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy}, modify_time = #{modifyTime}, version = version + 1 where host_id = #{hostId} and version = #{version}
update t_host_goods set is_delete = 1, last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy}, modify_time = #{modifyTime}, version = version + 1 where host_id = #{hostId}
